data.title: Command Staff
data.meta_description:
COMMAND STAFF Colonel Eric T. Olson Lt. Colonel David A. Flannigan Major Michael A. Turner Major Corey J. Schoeneberg Major Scott A. Shipers Major Michael A. Turner serves as commander of the Field Operations Bureau. He has direct
                        oversight
                        responsibility for all nine troops, the Aircraft Division, and the Water Patrol Division. Major Corey J. Schoeneberg serves as commander of the Administrative Services Bureau. As bureau commander, he has direct oversight of the Fleet & Facilities, Human Resources, and Training divisions. Major Scott A. Shipers serves as the commander of the Executive Services Bureau. He has direct oversight responsibility for the Budget & Procurement, Governorâ€™s Security, and Research & Development divisions, and governmental affairs.
